19  package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.chaos.actions;
20  
21  import java.io.IOException;
22  
23  import org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils;
24  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HColumnDescriptor;
25  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HTableDescriptor;
26  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HBaseAdmin;
27  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes;
28  
29  /**
30   * Action the adds a column family to a table.
31   */
32  public class AddColumnAction extends Action {
33    private final byte[] tableName;
34    private final String tableNameString;
35    private HBaseAdmin admin;
36  
37    public AddColumnAction(String tableName) {
38      tableNameString = tableName;
39      this.tableName = Bytes.toBytes(tableName);
40    }
41  
42    @Override
43    public void init(ActionContext context) throws IOException {
44      super.init(context);
45      this.admin = context.getHBaseIntegrationTestingUtility().getHBaseAdmin();
46    }
47  
48    @Override
49    public void perform() throws Exception {
50      HTableDescriptor tableDescriptor = admin.getTableDescriptor(tableName);
51      HColumnDescriptor columnDescriptor = null;
52  
53      while(columnDescriptor == null ||
54          tableDescriptor.getFamily(columnDescriptor.getName()) != null) {
55        columnDescriptor = new HColumnDescriptor(RandomStringUtils.randomAlphabetic(5));
56      }
57  
58      LOG.debug("Performing action: Adding " + columnDescriptor + " to " + tableNameString);
59  
60      tableDescriptor.addFamily(columnDescriptor);
61      admin.modifyTable(tableName, tableDescriptor);
62    }
63  }
